title: #dbONEDAY – social media wall
body: On Thursday September 26, employees in the UK offices will celebrate One Day, the biggest annual fundraiser in support of the bank’s Charities of the Year, Cure Leukaemia and Rays of Sunshine Children’s Charity. Our employees will get to opportunity to see celebs, beneficiaries, and staff from the charities, including the ICC Cricket World Cup Trophy as won by England on Sunday 14th July. Bookmark this link to find out what’s happening in the offices throughout the day!
